Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

It just came to my mind, that a Grav-Map would be nice to have so I searched the Wiki for the Numbers

Body Gravity on Surface (m/sÃ‚Â²)

Gilly 0,049

Pol 0,373

Minmus 0,491

Bop 0,589

Ike 1,1

Dres 1,13

Mun 1,63

Eeloo 1,69

Vall 2,31

Moho 2,7

Duna 2,94

Jool 7,85

Laythe 7,85

Tylo 7,85

Kerbin 9,81

Eve 16,7

Kerbol 17,1

Can someone pls doublecheck if these for Jool Laythe and Tylo are correct or mistyped in the Wiki?

Also the one for Eve seems a little too high.

Thanks guys

They look correct, both Tylo, Laythe and Jool has an gravity a bit lower than Kerbin.

Jool low gravity is probably as the upper atmosphere we can access is far from center.

Tylo is very hard to land on as it has no atmosphere.
Thanks Pals, I also discovered that they are as ASL Gravity in the Parameter Sheet in the Game. Didnt know that actually
